actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to repeal the Davis-Bacon Act and related provisions of law.

summary.text: Repeals the following provisions of Federal law: (1) the Davis-Bacon Act, as amended (40 U.S.C. 276a-276a-5); and (2) all legislation which is subject to Reorganization Plan Numbered 14 of 1950 (64 Stat. 1267). Provides that this Act shall take effect sixty days after its enactment, but shall not affect any contract then existing or any contract that may thereafter be entered into pursuant to invitations for bids that are outstanding at the time of the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the Davis-Bacon Act and related provisions of law.
